des:
The Legrand Lighting Control Skill enables you to connect your Alexa-enabled devices to your Legrand smart lighting. This skill is designed for products from "Smart Lighting from the radiant Collection Wi-Fi and "RF Lighting Control" only. With this skill, you can set scenes, dim the lights, group devices by room for simpler control, and more. 
To get started:
1. In your Legrand Light Control app or Legrand Smart Lights app, create or log into your Eliot account. 
2. In the Alexa app, go to "Skills & Games" and search for "Legrand Lighting Control".
3. Follow the in-app steps. 
4. Say "Alexa, discover my devices" or in the Alexa app click on "Discover devices" button.
5. After discovering your devices, they will appear in your device list in the Alexa app.
6. Then you can start interacting with your devices by voice.
For troubleshooting or support, please contact: tech.support@legrand.us
